Samuel Jackson Snead (May 27, 1912  May 23, 2002) was an American 
professional golfer who was one of the top players in the world for most of four 
decades. Snead won a record 82 PGA Tour events, including seven majors. He 
never won the U.S. Open, though he was runner-up four times. .... He is the only 
man to ever win an official LPGA Tour event.
